attributes.action: Make temperature testing at the school gate mandatory
attributes.additional_details: To protect our children and to remove the rumours from the general public regarding the use of children to spread such a deadly disease.
attributes.background: Over this pandemic I have visited places such as lego land, black gang chine and even numerous restaurants that temp check. Taking into account all schools have a large number of pupils I think it should be made a Law to temperature check every child before entering the classroom.
